data.name: nvim__get_hl_defs
data.description: TODO: Documentation

data.name: nvim__get_lib_dir
data.description: TODO: Documentation

data.name: nvim__id
data.description: Returns object given as argument.

data.name: nvim__id_array
data.description: Returns array given as argument.

data.name: nvim__id_dictionary
data.description: Returns dictionary given as argument.

data.name: nvim__id_float
data.description: Returns floating-point value given as argument.

data.name: nvim__inspect_cell
data.description: TODO: Documentation

data.name: nvim__screenshot
data.description: TODO: Documentation

data.name: nvim__stats
data.description: Gets internal stats.

data.name: nvim_call_atomic
data.description: Calls many API methods atomically.

data.name: nvim_call_dict_function
data.description: Calls a VimL |Dictionary-function| with the given arguments.

data.name: nvim_call_function
data.description: Calls a VimL function with the given arguments.

data.name: nvim_command
data.description: Executes an ex-command.

data.name: nvim_create_buf
data.description: Creates a new, empty, unnamed buffer.

data.name: nvim_create_namespace
data.description: Creates a new namespace, or gets an existing one.

data.name: nvim_del_current_line
data.description: Deletes the current line.

data.name: nvim_del_keymap
data.description: Unmaps a global |mapping| for the given mode.

data.name: nvim_del_var
data.description: Removes a global (g:) variable.

data.name: nvim_echo
data.description: Echo a message.

data.name: nvim_err_write
data.description:
Writes a message to the Vim error buffer. Does not append
                "\n", the message is buffered (won't display) until a linefeed
                is written.

data.name: nvim_err_writeln
data.description:
Writes a message to the Vim error buffer. Appends "\n", so the
                buffer is flushed (and displayed).

data.name: nvim_eval
data.description:
Evaluates a VimL |expression|. Dictionaries and Lists are
                recursively expanded.

data.name: nvim_exec
data.description:
Executes Vimscript (multiline block of Ex-commands), like
                anonymous |:source|.

data.name: nvim_exec_lua
data.description:
Execute Lua code. Parameters (if any) are available as `...`
                inside the chunk. The chunk can return a value.

data.name: nvim_feedkeys
data.description:
Sends input-keys to Nvim, subject to various quirks controlled
                by `mode` flags. This is a blocking call, unlike
                |nvim_input()|.

data.name: nvim_get_all_options_info
data.description: Gets the option information for all options.

data.name: nvim_get_api_info
data.description:
Returns a 2-tuple (Array), where item 0 is the current channel
                id and item 1 is the |api-metadata| map (Dictionary).

data.name: nvim_get_chan_info
data.description: Get information about a channel.

data.name: nvim_get_color_by_name
data.description:
Returns the 24-bit RGB value of a |nvim_get_color_map()| color
                name or "#rrggbb" hexadecimal string.

data.name: nvim_get_color_map
data.description: Returns a map of color names and RGB values.

data.name: nvim_get_commands
data.description: Gets a map of global (non-buffer-local) Ex commands.

data.name: nvim_get_context
data.description: Gets a map of the current editor state.

data.name: nvim_get_current_buf
data.description: Gets the current buffer.

data.name: nvim_get_current_line
data.description: Gets the current line.

data.name: nvim_get_current_tabpage
data.description: Gets the current tabpage.

data.name: nvim_get_current_win
data.description: Gets the current window.

data.name: nvim_get_hl_by_id
data.description: Gets a highlight definition by id. |hlID()|

data.name: nvim_get_hl_by_name
data.description: Gets a highlight definition by name.

data.name: nvim_get_hl_id_by_name
data.description: Gets a highlight group by name

data.name: nvim_get_keymap
data.description:
Gets a list of global (non-buffer-local) |mapping|
                definitions.

data.name: nvim_get_mode
data.description:
Gets the current mode. |mode()| "blocking" is true if Nvim is
                waiting for input.

data.name: nvim_get_namespaces
data.description: Gets existing, non-anonymous namespaces.

data.name: nvim_get_option
data.description: Gets an option value string.

data.name: nvim_get_option_info
data.description: Gets the option information for one option

data.name: nvim_get_proc
data.description: Gets info describing process `pid` .

data.name: nvim_get_proc_children
data.description: Gets the immediate children of process `pid` .

data.name: nvim_get_runtime_file
data.description: Find files in runtime directories

data.name: nvim_get_var
data.description: Gets a global (g:) variable.

data.name: nvim_get_vvar
data.description: Gets a v: variable.

data.name: nvim_input
data.description:
Queues raw user-input. Unlike |nvim_feedkeys()|, this uses a
                low-level input buffer and the call is non-blocking (input is
                processed asynchronously by the eventloop).

data.name: nvim_input_mouse
data.description: Send mouse event from GUI.

data.name: nvim_list_bufs
data.description: Gets the current list of buffer handles

data.name: nvim_list_chans
data.description: Get information about all open channels.

data.name: nvim_list_runtime_paths
data.description: Gets the paths contained in 'runtimepath'.

data.name: nvim_list_tabpages
data.description: Gets the current list of tabpage handles.

data.name: nvim_list_uis
data.description: Gets a list of dictionaries representing attached UIs.

data.name: nvim_list_wins
data.description: Gets the current list of window handles.

data.name: nvim_load_context
data.description: Sets the current editor state from the given |context| map.

data.name: nvim_notify
data.description: Notify the user with a message

data.name: nvim_open_win
data.description: Open a new window.

data.name: nvim_out_write
data.description:
Writes a message to the Vim output buffer. Does not append
                "\n", the message is buffered (won't display) until a linefeed
                is written.

data.name: nvim_parse_expression
data.description: Parse a VimL expression.

data.name: nvim_paste
data.description: Pastes at cursor, in any mode.

data.name: nvim_put
data.description: Puts text at cursor, in any mode.

data.name: nvim_replace_termcodes
data.description:
Replaces terminal codes and |keycodes| (<CR>, <Esc>, ...) in a
                string with the internal representation.

data.name: nvim_select_popupmenu_item
data.description: Selects an item in the completion popupmenu.

data.name: nvim_set_client_info
data.description: Self-identifies the client.

data.name: nvim_set_current_buf
data.description: Sets the current buffer.

data.name: nvim_set_current_dir
data.description: Changes the global working directory.

data.name: nvim_set_current_line
data.description: Sets the current line.

data.name: nvim_set_current_tabpage
data.description: Sets the current tabpage.

data.name: nvim_set_current_win
data.description: Sets the current window.

data.name: nvim_set_decoration_provider
data.description: Set or change decoration provider for a namespace

data.name: nvim_set_hl
data.description: Set a highlight group.

data.name: nvim_set_hl_ns
data.description: Set active namespace for highlights.

data.name: nvim_set_keymap
data.description: Sets a global |mapping| for the given mode.

data.name: nvim_set_option
data.description: Sets an option value.

data.name: nvim_set_var
data.description: Sets a global (g:) variable.

data.name: nvim_set_vvar
data.description: Sets a v: variable, if it is not readonly.

data.name: nvim_strwidth
data.description:
Calculates the number of display cells occupied by `text` .
                <Tab> counts as one cell.

data.name: nvim_subscribe
data.description: Subscribes to event broadcasts.

data.name: nvim_unsubscribe
data.description: Unsubscribes to event broadcasts.
